scripts.metrics:all: bun run start-pymetrics && bun run download-beir && bun run load-beir && bun run search-beir
scripts.metrics:download-and-load: bun run download-beir && bun run load-beir
scripts.metrics:search-and-evaluate: bun run search-beir && bun run evaluate-beir
scripts.metrics:help: echo 'BEIR metrics workflow: 1) start-pymetrics 2) download-beir <dataset> 3) load-beir 4) search-beir 5) evaluate-beir <results_file> <dataset>'
scripts.install:py-deps: cd py-metrics && uv pip install -r requirements.txt
